thread.title: 1-year-old killed when truck hits mom pushing stroller
thread.title_full: 1-year-old killed when truck hits mom pushing stroller | New York Post

author: Joe Tacopino
title: 1-year-old killed when truck hits mom pushing stroller
text:
A 1-year-old child was killed in Queens Thursday night when a truck collided with her stroller as her mother was pushing her across the street, cops said.
The mother and child were near 94th Street 23 Avenue when a Dodge Ram truck smashed into them at around 10:45 p.m., according to police.
“The woman was screaming and going crazy,” witness Leo Guerrero said. “She was trying to pull the stroller out from the truck.”
Guerrero said the baby was bleeding heavily and the driver was distraught when he realized he had injured someone.
“The driver got out and collapsed,” he said. “He sat on the ground crying.”
The baby suffered severe trauma to the head and was taken to Elmhurst General Hospital, where she died.
The driver of the truck remained on scene.
